member.name: T:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.Announcement
member.summary: Non-generics form of announcement representation, used to transfer data via channels.

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.Announcement.Segments
member.summary: Gets or sets the segments. Segmentation is done at the sending side, by Segmentation provider which can be register in order to segments different parts of the messages. The motivation of segmentation can come from regulation like GDPR (right to erasure: https://gdpr-info.eu/).
member.example: Segmentation provider can split the message into personal and non-personal segments.

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.Announcement.InterceptedData
member.summary: Gets or sets the mapping of data which was created by interceptors on the send side and should be evaluate by the interceptor at consume side.

member.name: T:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.Metadata
member.summary: Represent metadata of announcement (event). This information is available via Metadata.Current as long as the async-context exists. Recommended to materialize it before sending to queue and use Metadata.SetContext(metadata) </summary> <remarks> Unlike the segments, this part can be flow with message & will be set as async-context.

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.Metadata.Duration
member.summary: Calculation of Duration since produce time

member.name: T:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.ShardMetadata
member.summary: Represent metadata of message (command / event) metadata of a communication channel (Pub/Sub, Event Source, REST, GraphQL). It represent the operation's intent or represent event.

member.name: T:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.IDataSerializer
member.summary: Enable to replace the default serialization

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.IEventSourceConsumerOptions.BatchSize
member.summary: Gets the max batch size of reading messages per shard. The framework won't proceed to the next batch until all messages in the batch complete (or timeout when it set to acknowledge on timeout).

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.IEventSourceConsumerOptions.TimeoutBehavior
member.summary: Define the behavior of the framework on timeout.

member.name: P:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.IInterceptorName.InterceptorName
member.summary: Unique name which represent the correlation between the producer and consumer interceptor. It's recommended to use URL format.

member.name: F:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.TimeoutBehavior.Ack
member.summary: Will acknowledge the messages on timeout.

member.name: F:Weknow.EventSource.Backbone.TimeoutBehavior.Replay
member.summary: Will replay the messages on timeout.
